about.title: I'm a Full Stack Developer with a Informatic Engineer degree that resides in El Salvador

capabilities.description: Experience developing web and mobile applications, creation of scalable solutions backend services, creation of CI/CD solutions, code quality tests and optimization of performance. I have experience working with people of different countries and cultures. Also used a lot of tools like Microsoft Teams, Trello, Jira, etc.

experienceList.title: Full Stack Developer
experienceList.description: Designed and developed solutions using frontend and backend technologies. For the frontend used react native with cli and expo with typescript and React for web implementations. NodeJs with typescript for the backend, also worked with .net 6 and 8 creating migrations and services to SOAP and REST apis. Gave maintenance to multiple services using graphQL queries and mutations, resolvers, federations, codegen command creations, etc. Worked using environment variables using K8 and pipelines yaml files creation. I acquired experience using Azure environment like creating logic apps, the use of blob storage and pipelines config. Handling multiple repo using NX monorepo technologies and applying code coverage and unit testing for nodejs using jest. Worked with agile technologies, being moderator in dailys, plannings and review, using tools like azure boards, Microsoft teams and miro for meetings. Also Managed using tools for database management like dbeaver, redis cache manager, mongodb, lens, etc.

experienceList.title: Frontend Developer

Mounted applications based on designs by figma.Delivered production rollouts and control versions for IOS and Android stores. Good Practice implementation withEslint rules, prettier code formatter and husky commits. Administered the tasks using Agile methodologies (SCRUM),experience with JIRA tool. REST API integrations(Axios) Repository Management (Git/Gitlab).

experienceList.title: React Native Developer
